name: GGJ23 Into the Friches
description:
First time doing a "strategy" game, for the Global Game Jam 2023.
The goal is to balance the carbon emissions of a region, acting on the tiles with modifiers to shape the landscape and enhance to total score. 

Made with Godot Engine 4, Procreate, Fruityloops

Graphics, Sound and Music: Laurine Boyer

Game Design: Laurine Boyer, Michaël Boyer (myself)

Godot template by Bitbrain

https://github.com/bitbrain/godot-gamejam
